actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Commerce, Transportation and Tourism

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to make annuities payable before the first day of the month when the first day is on a weekend or holiday.

summary.text: Amends the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to make annuities payable before the first day of the month when the first day is on a weekend or a legal public holiday.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1974 to make annuities payable before the first day of the month when the first day is on a weekend or holiday.
